String.Source: Gross. I don't condone that sort of behavior.
String.Dest: 我不会容忍这种行为的，真恶心。

String.Source: The business with Gorr and the horker went well, I take it?
String.Dest: 与戈尔和三牙海象的生意进行的还不错？我说对了吗？

String.Source: Be a poet. You certainly have the angst.
String.Dest: 作为一个诗人。你当然会感慨人生苦短。

String.Source: Don't they have a store like that in Solitude?
String.Dest: 他们不是有一个商店吗？就像独孤城的那个。

String.Source: Would there be any? Profits?
String.Dest: 居然还有这种生意？有利润吗？

String.Source: What happens if she conjures you again?
String.Dest: 当她再次召唤你时，会发生什么？

String.Source: Preach, my inebriated friend, preach.
String.Dest: 布教，我的酒鬼朋友，布教。

String.Source: An End to Keep
String.Dest: 命运的另一端

String.Source: What was the significance of the Shadow sign?
String.Dest: 暗影标记有什么意义？

String.Source: Hit Rumarin with Friendly Fire
String.Dest: 用火焰魔法轻轻击中罗米勒

String.Source: Conspiracy of the Steps
String.Dest: 台阶的阴谋

String.Source: Find the Gossip Nythriel for Information on a Publisher
String.Dest: 找到那个包打听奈瑞儿并从其嘴里挖出关于出版商的信息

String.Source: Toss 3 Ingredients into the Cauldron
String.Dest: 往大锅里放入3种原料

String.Source: Right. A spouse would leave you over-encumbered.
String.Dest: 没错。配偶这种生物本来就是为了让你不堪重负而存在的。

String.Source: Find Information on S'vashni's Mentor and the Way of the Nine
String.Dest: 寻找关于斯维雪妮的导师以及九圣灵之道的信息

String.Source: One for each of the troubadours who brought Valerion to the Psijics.
String.Dest: 给那些把瓦列翁带去给赛伊克人的吟游诗人们一人一个

String.Source: (Military Camp or Fort) The war has left plenty of casualties.
String.Dest: （军营或堡垒）战争带来巨大伤亡。

String.Source: Arya
String.Dest: 阿雅

String.Source: I'm having issues springing you on my own.
String.Dest: 我在躲开你的时候出了点儿差错。

String.Source: And I take it he has you stand by and watch?
String.Dest: 我能理解为你一直偷偷躲在角落里看着他么？

String.Source: Talk to the Forger's Contact
String.Dest: 跟铁匠的熟人聊聊

String.Source: "Krin, Renrij."
String.Dest: "克林，仁里加。"

String.Source: DialogueRaynesHellos
String.Dest: DialogueRaynesHellos

String.Source: Pay Off the Merc of Zenithar
String.Dest: 给泽尼萨尔的雇佣兵结账

String.Source: Consult the Wandering Healer about Assisting Rumarin
String.Dest: 向旅行医者请教该如何帮助罗米勒

String.Source: None taken.
String.Dest: 一个都没说对。

String.Source: Deliver the Scroll to the Cultists
String.Dest: 把卷轴带给教徒们

String.Source: Better keep it brief.
String.Dest: 尽量长话短说。

String.Source: You're pathetic. I hope the cold takes you.
String.Dest: 你真可怜。愿你直接冻死。

String.Source: Retrieve the Shivs
String.Dest: 重组那剃刀

String.Source: Attend Zora Fair-Child's Match at Skytemple Ruins
String.Dest: 出席在天空神庙遗迹进行的与佐拉的比赛

String.Source: Being blind, I imagine someone relays this information to you.
String.Dest: 作为盲人，我猜有人把这条信息留给了你。

String.Source: The mistreatment of Dunmer in the Gray Quarter.
String.Dest: 在灰民区上演的那些对暗精灵的迫害事件。

String.Source: Yes, I remember the Red Year fondly. Although I prefer white wine myself.
String.Dest: 是的，红年仍然深深铭刻在我的记忆中。虽然我自己倒是更喜欢白葡萄酒。

String.Source: An Orc. Big, green, although you left out the "master race" part.
String.Dest: 一个兽人。硕大，稚嫩，不过你漏了“优等民族”那部分。

String.Source: Meet Isobel's Contact at the East Empire Company Office in Windhelm
String.Dest: 与在风舵城东帝国公司办公室的伊莎贝尔的熟人碰面

String.Source: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.
String.Dest: 托纳尔死了。马卡斯城终于摆脱银血家族的控制了。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: 比平均水平更糟。你在这儿简直算是糟透了。

String.Source: Who is Yngrid Far-Sky?
String.Dest: 银丽德·远天是谁？

String.Source: It could have been a Lamia.
String.Dest: 说不定是只蛇身妖怪呢。

String.Source: Zora usually respects people's privacy. I'm the one rifling through your stuff.
String.Dest: 佐拉向来尊重人们的隐私。我只是为了你的财物而来的。

String.Source: Lunar Lake Seranada.
String.Dest: 银月湖小夜曲。

String.Source: Gren claiming to be a bastard king probably made giving up your quest easier.
String.Dest: 格伦声称要当个混账国王，或许听了这个你会更容易放弃你的任务一些。

String.Source: "Broom Floor Sweep." If only that worked on people.
String.Dest: “拿着扫帚扫地去。”大概只有这句话能对人们起作用吧。

String.Source: "Dir Vol Aan!"
String.Dest: "德 沃兰！"

String.Source: Beauty is subjective, but you're objectively shallow.
String.Dest: 美是主观的，但你从客观上来说就不行。

String.Source: Filthy mages. Figures they'd have no respect for the sanctity of life.
String.Dest: 肮脏的法师。看来他们对生命的神圣之处没有半点尊重。

String.Source: Bah! If that tale gets any taller, it'll strike a moon.
String.Dest: 呸！若是故事再长下去，它可是会撞到月亮的。

String.Source: Are you joking? I barely knew Savrot Iron and Miriam Irvine.
String.Dest: 你是在开玩笑吗？我几乎都没听说过Savrot Iron 和Miriam Irvine。

String.Source: Are you "trolling" me right now?
String.Dest: 你这是在“钓”我上钩？

String.Source: How about another crabber song?
String.Dest: 再来首捕蟹人之歌如何？

String.Source: Investigate Bodan's Lead in Falkreath
String.Dest: 在佛克瑞斯调查波登的领导力

String.Source: "Pessial the Pink." I wish my mother had thought of that first.
String.Dest: “粉衣帕索”。可惜我老妈头一个想到的名字却不是它。

String.Source: Was their anything distinctive about this woman?
String.Dest: 这个女人身上有什么特别之处吗？

String.Source: Mingle or Talk to the Fair Lady to Proceed with the Match
String.Dest: 与窈窕淑女联系或聊天来推动比赛的进程

String.Source: DialogueHaakonHellos
String.Dest: DialogueHaakonHellos

String.Source: Find the Fence in Riften or Winterhold
String.Dest: 找到裂谷城或东堡的销赃者

String.Source: Confront Marla About the Potions
String.Dest: 在药剂的问题上与玛勒对抗

String.Source: Why not. I can play a little. (Draw Weapon When Done)
String.Dest: 为什么不呢，我倒是想玩一玩呢。（完成时拔出武器）

String.Source: Return to the Argonian Salvager
String.Dest: 回去找亚龙人救助者

String.Source: Lunar Lake Serenada.
String.Dest: 银月湖小夜曲。

String.Source: Meet the Brute of Talos
String.Dest: 见识下塔洛斯的残忍之处

String.Source: Speak with Jaspar Regarding Adonato's Odd Critique
String.Dest: 就阿多纳托那些奇怪的批评与贾斯帕谈谈

String.Source: In terms of strategy, using overhead strikes would avoid the walls completely.
String.Dest: 自战略层面上来看，如果从头顶往下攻击的话就能完美地避开墙壁了。

String.Source: Finally, someone to explain things. I'm confused. Help me understand.
String.Dest: 终于有人出面解释了。我很困惑，帮我理解一下吧。

String.Source: There is a cure, but you must feed first to tip the scales toward life.
String.Dest: 是有治疗的方法，但你首先得吃饱，这是维持生命的基本。

String.Source: Pathetic. I should do the world a favor and finish what the bandits started.
String.Dest: 可怜。我应该帮整个世界一个大忙，把那强盗行为扼杀在摇篮里。

String.Source: DualFlurry
String.Dest: DualFlurry

String.Source: Heroes are as poor as beggars. A good smith should be rewarded for their work.
String.Dest: 英雄们就跟乞丐一样穷。好铁匠总该为他们的手艺获得奖赏。

String.Source: Hail to you, mighty builder.
String.Dest: 强大的建造者，我向您致敬。

String.Source: Right, because getting felt up by filthy knaves is a good thing.
String.Dest: 没错，因为被那些肮脏的贱种摸着却有了感觉是件美妙的事情。

String.Source: Meet the Potential Housecarl
String.Dest: 与有潜力成为侍卫的人见面

String.Source: Forsworn rebels. Lay down your arms or have your arms cut off.
String.Dest: 弃誓者听好了，缴械不杀。

String.Source: Many people share a resemblance, but the similarities end there.
String.Dest: 很多人是挺相似，但在这点上，就显出差别来了。

String.Source: Tails are overrated.
String.Dest: 尾巴的作用被高估了。

String.Source: Funny. A High Elf named Eldawyn said as much, and Gilsi mentioned her too.
String.Dest: 有意思。一个名叫艾德雯的高精灵也这么说，而歌尔西也提到了她。

String.Source: (Optional) Agree to Aid S'vashni in Her Quest for the Stance of Arkay
String.Dest: （可选）同意帮助斯維雪妮来完成她那关于阿尔凯之势的任务

String.Source: So did you stay or report back to camp?
String.Dest: 那你是留下来了还是回去报告给营地了？

String.Source: Had I known he was Jadro'Ra's killer, he would've died in that cottage.
String.Dest: 如果我事先知道他就是杀死贾卓拉的凶手的话，那他会直接死在那座小屋里的。

String.Source: Lurgok says the corpse was a gift to Malacath. Why condemn him to die?
String.Dest: 勒高克认为尸体是献给玛拉凯斯的礼物。为何要将他处以极刑？

String.Source: The appetite for bloodsport could not have been high after the war.
String.Dest: 那种血腥残忍的爱好可比战争好不了多少。

String.Source: The Children Fair
String.Dest: The Children Fair

String.Source: Hogni is a smart man. The bloodier, the better.
String.Dest: 霍尼是聪明人。越残忍越好。

String.Source: Krog died valiantly. A true warrior to be sure.
String.Dest: 克罗格死得很英勇。毫无疑问他是个真正的战士。

String.Source: Odd. I was sick once, and I prayed to Talos and it healed me.
String.Dest: 奇怪。我以前也得过病，我向塔洛斯祈祷，于是它治好了我。

String.Source: Have Marigoth Teleport You Inside the Crystal
String.Dest: 让梅莉卡把你送入晶石内部

String.Source: The Hidden Blade
String.Dest: 隐之刃

String.Source: Wait for the Fence to Arrive at the Graveyard
String.Dest: 等待销赃者抵达墓地

String.Source: The Way to a Big Oaf's Heart
String.Dest: The Way to a Big Oaf's Heart

String.Source: Good riddance to that murdering bitch.
String.Dest: 终于摆脱那个天杀的婊子了。

String.Source: (Thieves Guild Questline) I've returned the Skeleton Key.
String.Dest: （盗贼工会任务）我已经归还了骷髅钥匙。

String.Source: Hopefully, not a dream of Ivarstead.
String.Dest: 还好，没梦见紫杉镇。

String.Source: Follow the Letter Trail to the Location of the Bloodgrass
String.Dest: 跟随字母的线索找到血草的位置

String.Source: Life and death are but words. You stand here, as do I.
String.Dest: 生存与死亡无非只是嘴上说说罢了。你站在这儿，所以我也在这儿。

String.Source: Ancient relics, immortal beasts...just another day out in the tundra for me.
String.Dest: 远古遗物，不朽的巨兽…对我来说，不过是我在苔原时所经历的日常罢了。

String.Source: Any friend of House Dres is a friend of mine.
String.Dest: 德莱议会的朋友就是我的朋友。

String.Source: The way you describe it, your business must have its ups and downs.
String.Dest: 按你的话说，生意也有起起落落。

String.Source: The wise course is to approach her, but with caution.
String.Dest: 靠近她是个不错的选择，但是要小心。

String.Source: Gilsi spoke of a "Long Night."
String.Dest: 歌尔西提到过“长夜”。

String.Source: Eliminate or Pickpocket a Suspect
String.Dest: 除掉一个嫌疑犯或者从他身上窃取证物

String.Source: Bring Rinori to the Summoning Circle During the Light Hours
String.Dest: 在日间将瑞诺丽带到召唤阵去
